LanguageData.Miho_Plus_Thought.stages.0.label: Yang deficiency
LanguageData.Miho_Plus_Thought.stages.1.label: Lack of yang
LanguageData.Miho_Plus_Thought.stages.1.description: I don't have enough yang! All kinds of primal emotions are tormenting me.
LanguageData.Miho_Plus_Thought.stages.3.label: Enough yang
LanguageData.Miho_Plus_Thought.stages.3.description: I feel like I've truly become a person.
LanguageData.Miho_Plus_Thought.stages.4.label: Full of yang
LanguageData.Miho_Plus_Thought.stages.4.description: I'm overflowing with yang. I feel like I'm truly human.
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Pipe_High_Thought.st: I feel like my mind is clear.
LanguageData.Miho_Restraint_Thought.stages.0.label: Sealed (rejection)
LanguageData.Miho_Restraint_Thought.stages.0.descript: What the hell are you doing? Unseal me!
LanguageData.Miho_Restraint_Thought.stages.1.label: Sealed (partial)
LanguageData.Miho_Restraint_Thought.stages.2.label: Sealed (adaptation)
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Thought.stages.0.des: Sweet and floral scent. Eating raw is not good...
